## Quiche `r family` `r freezes` `r vegan`

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="80%"}

8oz P flour \
6oz butter \
1 egg \
1tbsp cold water

:::

::: {.column width="20%"}

160째 \
28cm tart tin

:::

::::

*Method*

1. Make pastry, line tin, chill 15 mins.
1. Bake 10mins with beans.
1. Bake 10-15 ins without beans and leave to cool.

## Shortcrust pastry `r freezes` `r vegan` {#sec-shortcrust}

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="80%"}

4oz P flour \
2oz butter \
pinch salt \
2-3tbs cold water

:::

::: {.column width="20%"}

:::

::::

*Method*

- Blitz all butter and half flour for ~30 seconds to cookie dough texture - ensures flour is nicely coated.
- Add rest flour and pulse briefly to breadcrumbs - ensures flour can absorb water and build up some gluten for structure.

*Notes*

- For a sweet shortcrust replace 0.75oz of flour with icing sugar.
- Nice with lemon / clementine / orange zest too.
- Makes 12 x 78mm [mince pies](#sec-mincemeat) bases and star lids.
